meanings.definition: A member of an extinct group of mammal-like reptiles that existed during the Permian and Triassic periods.
meanings.sent1: The therapsid roamed the Earth millions of years ago.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of therapsids to learn about ancient life forms.
meanings.sent3: The therapsid decided to throw a party for all its extinct reptile friends.
meanings.sent4: In the museum, the therapsid skeleton stood as a reminder of prehistoric creatures.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the size of the therapsid in the museum exhibit.
